website_summaries.verdict: This set of reusable snack bags conveniently comes with 3 different sizes, allowing you to rotate them as needed.
pros: 3 different sizes accommodate everything from sandwiches to carefully portioned treats
Double-layered polyester construction is reasonably moisture-resistant and easy to care for
Comes in both kid and adult-friendly designs
cons: Can take a while to dry after washing

customer_reviews.title: Not air tight, but great nonetheless!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags I use them for my lunches at work or class. The patterns are cute and the zippers are super convenient. One of mine came with a small stain that looks like blue marker, but the bags were not used so I didn’t bother sending it back. I figured it wasn’t a common occurrence. The only downside to these bags is that they are not airtight so I can’t pack things like chips, crackers, dry cereal etc. the night before or they will be stale by lunch. Overall they are great. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Something small that brightens my day!
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy to use and easy to clean these bags are. I bought mine in 'blitzed' and love them. So far they are very durable and I have not had any issues with leaking. I feel like my food stays fresher longer! I've packed apple slices which after a few hours would normally go brown, but mine have stayed crisp all day. For the price, you can't beat it. I will definitely be purchasing more for as gifts in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie R

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The design on these are nice. I noticed a single small symbol within the design of each bag by the way. I found that amusing. The bags are a bit bigger than I originally thought, but that's okay with me! Very sturdy and easy to store away. Wonderful~
customer_reviews.author: Mell

customer_reviews.title: Cute design, easy to switch to.
customer_reviews.text: Only had a week or two but using them all fairly regularly and enjoying having minimal plastic bags! I do wish that one was actually the same size as a typical sandwich bag, as one is just a little small and the other is far larger
customer_reviews.author: Elmfo

customer_reviews.title: Best reusable bags I've tried!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. Sturdy construction and durable material. My classmate's jaw literally dropped today when I pulled them out in class. #gradschool
customer_reviews.author: dt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and reusability of these bags:)I love washing these bags in my dishwasher:)
customer_reviews.author: MommaB

customer_reviews.title: Not dishwasher safe, inconvenient shape
customer_reviews.text: None of the packaging says that it is dishwasher safe. The inside is lined but with a cloth fabric, not ideal to keep bread soft or transport PB &J. The shapes are strange, only 1 bag is the ideal shape for a sandwich. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: E. McG.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! Functional. Good fabric. Used for food, pencil case, carrying miscellaneous items.
customer_reviews.author: Kali

customer_reviews.title: Very practical
customer_reviews.text: Good material, easy to clean in dishwasher. I wish the could come in more smaller sizes instead of the large one, I don’t really have a use for that one.
customer_reviews.author: Ale

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for zip top baggies!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! These are great bags to replace plastic zio top baggies. Easy to clean, although take a little extra time to dry. Overnight is usually enough if dried opened up. Great colors.
customer_reviews.author: Stree

customer_reviews.title: Faulty zipper
customer_reviews.text: I love the bags in general but one of the zippers doesn’t work and I can’t get it to open at all! :(
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: They have an awful smell that won’t go away
customer_reviews.text: I should have read more of the reviews. They are pretty cheap, and you can certainly tell they’re made in China. They have a smell to them that I can’t describe. It’s alnost like a toxic smell. I’ve washed them multiple times, and they still stink! I can’t even bring myself to keep using them because they make all of the food taste bad. Plus, it takes over a day for these to dry. I guess I’ll use these for non-food items.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Piper

customer_reviews.title: These are nice bags but they are not really that great for ...
customer_reviews.text: These are nice bags but they are not really that great for food. It's basically a pencil case. Food will get stale if left there more than 2 hours. I once had a sandwich in there on top of an ice pack and when I took out the sandwich it was soaked.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Fran

customer_reviews.title: Great size. Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: Great size for snacks and sandwiches. Easy to clean by turning inside out (I have not tried putting them in with laundry). I love that they zip close and really can be used for anything you need a bag for.
customer_reviews.author: lizzi

customer_reviews.title: Such great bags!!!
customer_reviews.text: Save the planet and use less Ziploc bags! These are really cute to put in your kids lunches and you can store a lot of food in them.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany

customer_reviews.title: I really like these. I'm trying to reduce my consumption of ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. I'm trying to reduce my consumption of Ziploc bags, and these have been helping a lot. They wash well, and dry fast.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: They’re ok
customer_reviews.text: They’re a little cheaper than what I expected. Still useful for lunches.
customer_reviews.author: C Aurele

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect Since she often brings her lunch to work
customer_reviews.text: I gave my niece these bags as a gift. These are perfect Since she often brings her lunch to work. We are both committed to doing what little we can to reduce waste and this works in keeping her food sealed & fresh as well as reducing the environmental impact.
customer_reviews.author: barbara pevitz

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags. They are great for any type of snack and can pretty much replace ziplock bags. They are not completely water proof but pretty good. Different sizes are great.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Got another set for me and one for my daughter
customer_reviews.author: kenneth n walker

customer_reviews.title: Happy to not need to throw away plasic everyday!
customer_reviews.text: Kids are starting school and will use these instead of plastic baggies. Easy to open and seem to seal fairly well! (Wouldn't use for liquidy things)
customer_reviews.author: Kirstian S.

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my "GREEN"sister. She lives them and ordered more.
customer_reviews.author: J. Blanton

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite lunch baggies. Great for the environment, cute patterns, super easy to wash. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Davis

product_meta.title: Wegreeco Reusable Sandwich & Snack Bags - Set of 3 - (Blitzed)
feature_bullets: Set of 3, Small size 7.0 inches X 4.2 inch, Medium size 7.7inches X 5.5 inches, Large size 8.0 inches X 8.5 inches.Machine washable!

Wegreeco Cloth Snack Bag with double layers fabric construction provide no leak design and more air tight. Since the reusable snack bags are made of fabric, they are not completely airtight, if you decide to use them to pack crackers, crisps, pretzels or cookies, please eat them earlier to enjoy them fresh. All of the bags are precise stitching and quality interior & exterior fabric makes these bags durable.

A smooth zipper closure doesn't hold crumbs means no worrying about icky stuff growing. It's great for food like sliced fruit, sandwiches, sticky or messy foods as well as any dry snacks. The Quality Zipper top closure & leak-free interior also keep crumbs,drips & contents inside.

The Reusable Lunch Bags helps us creating a waste-free lunch! No more plastic baggies, plastic wrap or aluminum foil. Not just for food, the bags are great for kids rayon, art supplies, small toys, baby pacifiers, diapering items, day care or pre-school items, keys, makeup, toiletries, travel and endless other possibilities.

Stylish Patterns for female and male, we have young and mature style, you are able to find a pattern that fits what you are looking for and feel free to pack your lunches in them and take them to work on a daily basis.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars52 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
